alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 05 at 5:56AM AKST until January 05 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions occuring. Winds gusting to 50 mph. * WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Blowing snow will cause whiteout conditions. Large snow drifts will form. Wind chills to 50 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to decrease slowly late this morning into this afternoon. Visibility is expected to improve above one mile by noon today.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
